titles.title: Supporting the work of firefighters to educate and protect the Nation's communities, and the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
9/23/2008--Introduced.
Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week; and (2) the work of firefighters to educate and protect the nation's communities.
